tumor: Infiltrating nests and cords of pleomorphic epithelial cells.
Large, hyperchromatic nuclei with irregular nuclear membranes.
Disorganized sheets of atypical cells with prominent nucleoli.
A chaotic proliferation of cells with a high nuclear-to-cytoplasmic ratio.
Densely packed cells with dark purple nuclei invading fibrous stroma.
Irregularly shaped malignant glands and ductal structures.
Atypical mitotic figures within pleomorphic tumor cells.
stroma: Wavy pink collagen fibers with scattered spindle cells.
Elongated cells with bland, ovoid nuclei.
Streaming bundles of pink extracellular matrix.
Paucicellular fibrous tissue with a collagenous background.
Spindle-shaped nuclei embedded in a pink stroma.
Hypocellular fibrous tissue with a wispy texture.
lymphocyte: Small round cells with large, dark-staining nuclei.
A dense hyperchromatic nucleus with a scant rim of cytoplasm.
Deeply basophilic round nuclei with condensed chromatin.
Scattered, individual dark purple cells infiltrating the stroma.
High nuclear-to-cytoplasmic ratio with a round, dark nucleus.
Small, dark cells resembling an "ink dot" appearance.
Dense aggregates of small, round, dark blue inflammatory cells.
necrosis: Amorphous eosinophilic material with cellular debris.
Sheets of dead cells with glassy pink cytoplasm and faded nuclei.
A central core of coagulative necrosis with ghost-like cell outlines.
Clumps of cells with pyknotic nuclei and karyorrhectic dust.
Acellular granular debris with intense eosinophilic staining.
Fields of anucleated shadow cells with indistinct borders.
Fragmented, shrunken, and hyperchromatic nuclear remnants.
blood_vessel: A circular channel lined by a single layer of flattened, dark nuclei.
Lumen containing a cluster of anucleated, eosinophilic red blood cells.
A cross-section of a vessel filled with pink erythrocytes.
An ovoid space surrounded by elongated endothelial cell nuclei.
A thin-walled tubular structure with a central, open lumen.
A channel lined by hyperchromatic, spindle-shaped endothelial nuclei.
A collection of small, circular, bright red cells within a defined vessel.
background: White empty space on a glass slide
A clear, circular air bubble artifact
Out-of-focus blurry region without cellular detail
A sharp fold or crease in the tissue section
Absence of biological tissue and cellular structures
